sql.if: join tdq_credit_user tcu on tcu.biz_code = t.code and tcu.loan_role = '1'
inner join tsys_role_node trn on t.cur_node_code=trn.node_code
inner join tsys_role_node trn on t.intev_cur_node_code=trn.node_code
inner join tsys_role_node trn on t.make_card_node=trn.node_code
inner join tsys_role_node trn on t.fbhgps_node=trn.node_code
inner join tsys_role_node trn on t.enter_node_code=trn.node_code
inner join tsys_role_node trn on t.cancel_node_code=trn.node_code

trim.if: AND (t.team_code = #{teamCode} OR t.code in (select biz_code from tsys_biz_log where operator=#{userId}))

if.test: isMy == '1' and userId != '' and userId != null

trim.if: AND t.code in (select biz_code from tsys_biz_log where operator=#{userId})

if.test: roleCode != null and roleCode != '' and ((curNodeCodeList != null and curNodeCodeList.size() > 0 ) or (intevCurNodeCodeList != null and intevCurNodeCodeList.size() > 0) or (makeCardNodeList != null and makeCardNodeList.size() > 0) or (fbhgpsNodeList != null and fbhgpsNodeList.size() > 0) or (enterNodeCodeList != null and enterNodeCodeList.size() > 0) or (cundangStatusList != null and cundangStatusList.size() > 0) or (cancelNodeCodeList != null and cancelNodeCodeList.size() > 0))

mapper.select:
SELECT distinct t.code ,t.biz_code ,t.type ,t.biz_type ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.company_code ,t.team_code ,t.captain_code ,t.sale_user_id ,t.inside_job ,t.loan_bank ,t.credit_loan_amount ,t.loan_amount ,t.enter_location ,t.enter_datetime ,t.enter_filelist ,t.repay_card_number ,t.card_post_province ,t.card_post_city ,t.card_post_area ,t.card_post_address ,t.card_post_code ,t.status ,t.intev_status ,t.make_card_status ,t.fbhgps_status ,t.enter_status ,t.cancel_status ,t.cur_node_code ,t.intev_cur_node_code ,t.make_card_node ,t.fbhgps_node ,t.enter_node_code ,t.cancel_node_code ,t.is_gps_az ,t.is_finacing ,t.is_advance_fund ,t.is_plat_insure ,t.should_fee_amount ,t.real_fee_amount ,t.gua_mode ,t.credit_note ,t.apply_datetime ,t.remark ,b.bank_name as loan_bank_name ,bt.name as team_name ,su.real_name as sale_user_name ,sc.name as sale_user_company_name ,sd.name as sale_user_department_name ,sp.name as sale_user_post_name ,iu.real_name as inside_job_name ,ic.name as inside_job_company_name ,id.name as inside_job_department_name ,ip.name as inside_job_post_name ,rb.periods as periods FROM tqj_cdbiz t left join tsys_user su on t.sale_user_id=su.user_id left join tsys_user iu on t.inside_job=iu.user_id left join tb_bank b on b.code = t.loan_bank left join tsys_biz_team bt on bt.code = t.team_code left join tsys_department sc on su.company_code=sc.code left join tsys_department sd on su.department_code=sd.code left join tsys_department sp on su.post_code=sp.code left join tsys_department ic on iu.company_code=ic.code left join tsys_department id on iu.department_code=id.code left join tsys_department ip on iu.post_code=ip.code left join tdh_repay_biz rb on rb.biz_code = t.code
t.${order}

SELECT t.code ,t.biz_code ,t.type ,t.biz_type ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.company_code ,t.team_code ,t.captain_code ,t.sale_user_id ,t.inside_job ,t.loan_bank ,t.credit_loan_amount ,t.loan_amount ,t.enter_location ,t.enter_datetime ,t.enter_filelist ,t.repay_card_number ,t.card_post_province ,t.card_post_city ,t.card_post_area ,t.card_post_address ,t.card_post_code ,t.status ,t.intev_status ,t.make_card_status ,t.fbhgps_status ,t.enter_status ,t.cancel_status ,t.cur_node_code ,t.intev_cur_node_code ,t.make_card_node ,t.fbhgps_node ,t.enter_node_code ,t.cancel_node_code ,t.is_gps_az ,t.is_finacing ,t.is_advance_fund ,t.is_plat_insure ,t.should_fee_amount ,t.real_fee_amount ,t.gua_mode ,t.credit_note ,t.apply_datetime ,t.remark FROM tqj_cdbiz t where t.code = #{code} for update

SELECT distinct t.code ,t.biz_code ,t.type ,t.biz_type ,t.repay_biz_code ,t.company_code ,t.team_code ,t.captain_code ,t.sale_user_id ,t.inside_job ,t.loan_bank ,t.credit_loan_amount ,t.loan_amount ,t.enter_location ,t.enter_datetime ,t.enter_filelist ,t.repay_card_number ,t.card_post_province ,t.card_post_city ,t.card_post_area ,t.card_post_address ,t.card_post_code ,t.status ,t.intev_status ,t.make_card_status ,t.fbhgps_status ,t.enter_status ,t.cancel_status ,t.cur_node_code ,t.intev_cur_node_code ,t.make_card_node ,t.fbhgps_node ,t.enter_node_code ,t.cancel_node_code ,t.is_gps_az ,t.is_finacing ,t.is_advance_fund ,t.is_plat_insure ,t.should_fee_amount ,t.real_fee_amount ,t.gua_mode ,t.credit_note ,t.apply_datetime ,t.remark ,b.bank_name as loan_bank_name ,bt.name as team_name ,su.real_name as sale_user_name ,sc.name as sale_user_company_name ,sd.name as sale_user_department_name ,sp.name as sale_user_post_name ,iu.real_name as inside_job_name ,ic.name as inside_job_company_name ,id.name as inside_job_department_name ,ip.name as inside_job_post_name ,rb.periods as periods FROM tqj_cdbiz t left join tsys_user su on t.sale_user_id=su.user_id left join tsys_user iu on t.inside_job=iu.user_id left join tb_bank b on b.code = t.loan_bank left join tsys_biz_team bt on bt.code = t.team_code left join tsys_department sc on su.company_code=sc.code left join tsys_department sd on su.department_code=sd.code left join tsys_department sp on su.post_code=sp.code left join tsys_department ic on iu.company_code=ic.code left join tsys_department id on iu.department_code=id.code left join tsys_department ip on iu.post_code=ip.code left join tdh_repay_biz rb on rb.biz_code = t.code
t.${order}

SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT distinct t.code FROM tqj_cdbiz t
) tb
